meanings.definition: The quality or state of being unacceptable.
meanings.sent1: The unacceptability of his behavior was clear to everyone.
meanings.sent2: The unacceptability of the situation led to a heated discussion.
meanings.sent3: The unacceptability of eating ice cream with a fork made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The unacceptability of his actions cast a shadow over the entire event.
meanings.sent5: The unacceptability of cheating in the game was a lesson for all.

meanings.definition: The condition of not meeting the required standards or expectations.
meanings.sent1: Her work's unacceptability was evident in the numerous errors.
meanings.sent2: The unacceptability of the product caused a delay in the launch.
meanings.sent3: The unacceptability of wearing socks with sandals was a fashion faux pas.
meanings.sent4: The unacceptability of his excuse left everyone disappointed.
meanings.sent5: The unacceptability of the team's performance was a wake-up call for improvement.
